TopicTitle: We like Mudkipz - the PokÃƒÂ©mon Thread!

Articles.Content:
I felt that it was time to open a thread for PokÃƒÂ©mon on the KSP forums, because it seems to me, that there are indeed some PokÃƒÂ©mon fans around here! I thought, that we really needed a seperate place to discuss everything concerning PokÃƒÂ©mon.

So, for getting started, I would like to know something from you, my dear PokÃƒÂ©mon-comrades;

What's your favourite PokÃƒÂ©mon type? What are your favourite 3 (or more) PokÃƒÂ©mon? And why? And, what's most important, do you like Mudkipz?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

My favourite PokÃƒÂ©mon type is Steel. I love the fact, that there is not much that can seriously harm a steel PokÃƒÂ©mon.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

My #1 favourite PokÃƒÂ©mon is Latias. Not a steel PokÃƒÂ©mon, I know, but I think it looks very neat and elegant. I mean, it's based on a fighter jet! .It also packs quite a punch, but seriously; what are you expecting from a legendary PokÃƒÂ©mon?

With it's dragon/psychic-type and it's special ability, it also has quite some nice resistances, what makes it perfect against the average enemy.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

My #2 favourite PokÃƒÂ©mon is Registeel. Simply because it looks badass, has high values and is a steel-type. Try defeating Brian's Registeel in PokÃƒÂ©mon: Emerald and you know what I'm talking about. Fighting a PokÃƒÂ©mon that can poison your PokÃƒÂ©mon but cannot be poisoned itself is a... 'lovely' experience.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

My #3 favourite PokÃƒÂ©mon is Skarmory. (I think it's name sounds waaaay more better in german: "Panzaeron".) Seriously, in every PokÃƒÂ©mon-game I play, I'm catching me a Skarmory and name it "Stalin". Most enemies fail in defeating them, because Skarmory has the second-highest type-resistance of all PokÃƒÂ©mon - the enemies fail, but Skarmory can hit them very hard! (Or at least annoy them). And it cannot be poisoned.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

I also like: Latios (same reasons as Latias), Regice (...), Kyogre (cute fish), Rayquaza (badass dragon), Metagross (steel monster) and Magneton ( electro is my #2 favourite type and it's also steel ).

I'm playing PokÃƒÂ©mon: Black Edition 2 atm and sadly I'm quite disappointed of it Seriously, after playing SoulSilver, Black 2 just feels bad, IMO.

Last but not least:

Yeah of course, I like Mudkipz!*

*I've chosen it as my starter every time I could.

That I chose the [GAMES]-prefix IMO doesn't mean, that discussions about the PokÃƒÂ©mon anime/ films don't belong here. I just had to select a prefix...

I also would like to excuse for my (probably) bad english.

Edited May 18, 2014 by Stahlwerk
